title: Plan in works to fast-track transmission of renewable energy, says MNRE Secretary
description: The government plans to expedite transmission capacity to support renewable energy and green hydrogen projects. Renewable energy secretary Bhupinder Singh Bhalla highlighted the timeline for green hydrogen and electrolyser projects, ensuring sufficient time for transmission system additions. This aligns with India's National Green Hydrogen Mission and targets for non-fossil energy capacity by 2030.
